document_data.name: ''The Way of a Wizard''

document_data.Contents: The book collected information about wizardly pursuits and [[Mystran]] worship. ''The Way of a Wizard'' was written by Sundral, a loyal servant of the Goddess of Magic in the {{YearlinkName|1044}}.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
